text: mu#KaqtO dha#ttE mUd^^rdhaqnvatI$rBavanti mUqd^^rdhAna#mEqvaina(gm)# samAqnAnA$M karOti triqShTuBaq upa# dadhAtIndriqyaM ~Mvai triqShTugi#ndriqyamEqva ma#ddhyaqtO dha#ttEq jaga#tIqrupa# dadhAtiq jAga#tAq vai paqSava#H paqSUnEqvAva# rundhE &nuqShTuBaq upa# dadhAti prAqNA vA a#nuqShTup prAqNAnAqmuthsRu#ShTyai bRuhaqtIruqShNihA$H paq~gktIraqkShara#pa~gktIqritiq viShu#rUpANiq CandAq(gg)qsyupa# dadhAtiq viShu#rUpAq vai paqSava#H paqSavaqH - [  ] 36
